title: (f) of section 21 of the Road Traffic Act 2024 (No. 10 of 2024) shall come into
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Road Traffic Act 2024 (Commencement)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Road Traffic Act 2024 (Commencement) 

(No. 4) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited road traffic act 2024 (commencement) (no 4) order 2024

title: (f) of section 21 of the Road Traffic Act 2024 (No. 10 of 2024) shall come into
heading: 2. The 31st day of March 2025 is appointed as the day on which paragraph
text_raw:
2. The 31st day of March 2025 is appointed as the day on which paragraph 
(f) of section 21 of the Road Traffic Act 2024 (No. 10 of 2024) shall come into 
operation. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister for 
Transport, 

6 November, 2024. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for Transport. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 8th November, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [614] 3
